snippet.title: Sengoku Jidai Shadow of the Shogun - The Art of Conquest Trailer
snippet.description:
Slitherine product page: http://bit.ly/1RIxq1V
Steam product page: http://bit.ly/1WhzD6y

At the battle of Anegawa, would you find a trick to triumph against Oda Nobunaga and his new ally Tokugawa Ieyasu? Who will you support at the battle of Yamazaki? the man who forced Nobunaga to commit seppuku or the warriors who stayed loyal to the leader of their clan? Can you maneuver your forces wisely and defeat the historical victors?

With the wealth of historical scenarios you'll be able to experiment with new approaches and face the many challenges posed by the leaders with different military philosophies. And this is just an appetizer, as campaign, skirmish and multiplayer modes are awaiting you in a beautifully immersive samurai extravaganza!

This new wargame from Jayson Ng and Richard Bodley Scott is now available on PC!
